description: A delicious and spicy chicken pasta dish with a tangy tomato sauce.
recipe: Cook pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside.
In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add chopped onions and garlic. Saut√© until fragrant.
Add diced chicken to the pan and cook until browned.
Pour in crushed tomatoes, red chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Add the cooked pasta to the sauce. Toss until the pasta is well coated.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.
